subject: Basketball
Social Media
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: DeAndre Jordan reneged on his oral agreement to join the Mavericks and re-signed with the Clippers, who had sent Coach Doc Rivers and several players to persuade him to return.
snippet: DeAndre Jordan reneged on his oral agreement to join the Mavericks and re-signed with the Clippers, who had sent Coach Doc Rivers and several players to persuade him to return.
